page.title: 08Rural Entertainment
page.content: Nowadays the people living in our area rely on going into Ormskirk itself or into Southport for entertainment. They go to the latter place for Bingo and the Cinema, and to both places for public houses, wine bars and restaurants, as there is only one cafe in our block, that being chiefly for the benefit of people in cars using the main road, which is on the fringe of the area. One leisure activity which takes place in our area itself is motor bike scrambling and there are facilities for pony trekking. Watching T.V. is the way in which most people spend their leisure time and a mobile library van caters for the people who enjoy reading.
